title: The Devil is in the Details: Examining Matt Murdock and Daredevil
description: For half a century, Daredevil has been an outsider and a paradox, a loner, a down-to-earth super-hero, a blind man with super-powers, and the star of some of Marvel’s most celebrated stories.THE DEVIL IS IN THE DETAILS examines both Daredevil and his alter ego, Matt Murdock, from a variety of critical perspectives. Whether it’s explorations of Daredevil’s troubled history with love, his relationship to Foggy Nelson or Spider-Man, or new takes on his classic runs, this is one book no Daredevil fan or scholar should be without.From Sequart Research & Literacy Organization. More info at http://Sequart.org
author: Ryan K. Lindsay
